attributes.action: Reward Roger Harry Daltrey C.B.E. with a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Roger Daltrey, actor, musician and lead singer with popular beat combo 'The Who' has raised literally millions of pounds for charity through his patronage of the 'Teenage Cancer Trust' and through organising annual fund-raising concerts at the Royal Albert Hall. 

Roger has so-far only been publicly rewarded with a C.B.E. in 2004.

In addition to his sterling charity work Roger has also generated millions for the UK economy in his capacity as singer with The Who.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
